forecast.name: Today
forecast.detailedForecast: Sunny. High near 70, with temperatures falling to around 65 in the afternoon. West southwest wind 5 to 9 mph.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Partly cloudy, with a low around 52. West southwest wind around 9 mph.

weather_report:
In Downtown San Francisco, a stunningly clear day unfolds—sunlight spills over the cityscape, warming the air to a pleasant near 70 degrees. The sky above is a seamlessly clear blue canvas, dotted only with the occasional wisp of cloud, casting an inviting promise on this mid-April day. As the afternoon approaches, expect temperatures to dip gently to around 65, while a soft west-southwest breeze whispers through the streets at roughly 5 to 9 mph, giving a mild and refreshing kiss against your skin. 

Although the marine layer might be lingering in some areas, the city itself is basking in clarity, suggesting that the fog is held at bay, far from the expanse of the Golden Gate. For those venturing out, light layers will serve you well; consider a light jacket or cardigan if you plan to bask in the golden hour as the city begins to cool post-sunset. With such inviting weather, a leisurely stroll along the Embarcadero could provide a splendid way to absorb the vibrant atmosphere or perhaps a visit to a café where you can enjoy a book while sipping on a warm beverage. Today’s serenity and warmth beckon for quiet enjoyment as life moves in a rhythm of its own.
